md:
giải nghĩa từ "arc" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan và các từ trái nghĩa.

arc (noun)

* Meaning: a part of a curve, especially a part of a circle
* Example: The arc of the bridge spanned the river.
* Related words: curve, circle, bend
* Antonyms: straight line, angle

arc (verb)

* Meaning: to move in a curved path
* Example: The plane arced through the sky.
* Related words: curve, bend, turn
* Antonyms: go straight, fly level

arc (electricity)

* Meaning: a spark of electricity that jumps from one point to another
* Example: The arc of electricity lit up the dark room.
* Related words: spark, flash, electrical discharge
* Antonyms: none

Note: The meanings of "arc" can vary depending on the context in which it is used. The above definitions are some of the most common meanings of the word.
